plays.text: Goal scored by Shawn Bates assisted by Mark Parrish and Michael Peca
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Hooking Mathieu Dandenault
Penalty to Mark Parrish 2 minutes for Interference Brett Hull
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Holding Kenny Jonsson
Goal scored by Kris Draper unassisted
Penalty to Shawn Bates 2 minutes for High Sticking Chris Chelios
Goal scored by Kris Draper assisted by Maxim Kuznetsov
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Elbowing Jason Blake
Penalty to Claude Lapointe 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Jiri Fischer
Penalty to Jiri Fischer 2 minutes for Roughing Claude Lapointe
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Holding Roman Hamrlik
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Slashing Alexei Yashin
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 10 minutes for Gross Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
